GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis: COM for Lae'zel at the Knights of the Shield hideout.
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM.how_to_trigger: This will be triggered walking into the hideout with an avatar different to Lae'zel. She can be in the party or not, dialog handle both ways.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.synopsis: AOM and OOM for Lae'zel at Knights of the Shield. The Githyanki Inquisitor will talk to players and, in the end, attack them.
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Enter Knights of the Shield and be spotted by any of the Githyanki there.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_43.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_43.text: Here you are, as brazen as described.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_39.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_39.text: The gloomed soul who thieved from our queen.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_30.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_30.text: The gloomed soul who thieved from our queen.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_74.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_74.text: Of course, you had help, didn't you? From the illithid you carry inside the Astral Prism.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_18.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_18.text: How quaint that we should meet here - in the very place that it once called home.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_11.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_11.text: We know all about the 'Emperor' and its dealings with you. Though I must confess its peculiar relationship with you threw us off course for a while.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_81.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_81.text: Most illithids prefer to dominate their thralls through transformation, yet here you stand, only partially transformed.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_24.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_24.text: Tell me - what did it offer you in exchange for your servitude?

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_25.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_25.text: How did you know about that?

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_37.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_37.text: Have you quite forgotten what and who we are, kin?

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_12.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_12.text: Mind flayers are our quarry. We have filled libraries with our knowledge of how to hunt them down.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_0.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_0.text: We tracked it from the moment the Astral Prism fell into its claws.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_55.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_55.text: And now that we have found it, we will reclaim the Astral Prism, purge it of the illithid interloper, and restore it to its rightful owner.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: You should know the Emperor is not the only occupant of the Astral Prism.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_26.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_26.text: My dear child, I already know all there is to know.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_32.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_32.text: I'd give it to you freely, if the mind flayer would let me.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_23.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_23.text: Ha! I see it keeps you on a tight leash. Very good.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_54.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_54.text: I will liberate you from your puppet-master. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith!
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_54.context: NodeContext: Vlaakith's will above all! shouted as combat rally

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_10.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_10.text: I'd give it to you freely, if it were possible to do so.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_46.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_46.text: I will remember you said that.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_17.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_17.text: I was not asking for it. Htak'a!

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_73.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_73.text: I've fought stronger, faster, and more accomplished warriors than you. You cannot win.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_48.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_48.text: I'll send you home in your own box!

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_66.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_66.text: Death will be yours and yours alone, ghaik slave. Htak'a!

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_7.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_7.text: The promise of defeating the elder brain.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_78.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_78.text: And you would trust an illithid to do such a thing?

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_16.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_16.text: I serve one far greater than any illithid. We are merely allies.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_70.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_70.text: There's no servitude - the illithid is my ally.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_27.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_27.text: My people served the illithid once - never again. We are allies.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: My people answer to none but Gruumsh. We are merely allies.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_41.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_41.text: I thought you said this one was smart, W'wargaz?
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: addressed to W'wargazNodeContext: sneering

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_50.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_50.text: You have fallen prey to its manipulation.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_63.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_63.text: Your story ends here. We will reclaim the Astral Prism, purge it of the illithid interloper, and restore it to our queen.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_49.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_49.text: I serve none other than the wild tempest that is nature. We are merely allies.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_84.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_84.text: Most illithids prefer to dominate their thralls through transformation, yet here you stand, untransformed.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_62.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_62.text: The traitor who would steal from our queen.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_44.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_44.text: It seems your report was good, W'wargaz.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_47.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_47.text: Lae'zel. Glad you could join us.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_36.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_36.text: The kith'raki have spread word of that artefact that you carry.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_9.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_9.text: Tell me, Lae'zel of K'liir. What reward do you think the Astral Prism will fetch once I pluck it from your corpse and present it to Vlaakith?

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_19.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_19.text: What honours, what riches, will the Undying Queen grant me when I hand her the failed prince?

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_31.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_31.text: Stand down! It is on our queen's sacred order that I keep the Prism close.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_71.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_71.text: The Undying Queen cares not for who delivers her the Prism and the traitor prince within.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_20.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_20.text: All that matters is that it is delivered.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_53.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_53.text: The false heir's head will make a fine trophy for Vlaakith. As for you -

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_80.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_80.text: - I will leave nothing behind but meat and shattered bone.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_59.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_59.text: Strike me and die, a failed warrior forgotten by your people.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_79.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_79.text: Vlaakith entrusted Lae'zel with the Prism. Interfere, and the queen's sure to punish you.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_76.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_76.text: And you, Lae'zel - a child, an unascended - would snatch my glory for herself.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_72.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_72.text: You may keep your head. But I will yet be exalted. I will yet see my name carved in slate.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_87.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_87.context: NodeContext: Confidently, but not as a battle cry. VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im HRATH KRAHSH-het. Only in Vlaakith may we find light.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_28.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_28.text: Damnable whelp. For a thousand years have I given my life to Vlaakith.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_13.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_13.text: I will deliver to her the Prince of the Comet. She shall exalt me. The gish will record my great deed in slate!

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_65.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_65.text: I'd give the artefact to you freely, but it isn't possible.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_82.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_82.text: Orpheus is the githyanki's true prince. You will not take him.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_21.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_21.text: Orpheus is the githyanki's true prince. You will not take him.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_5.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_5.text: Orpheus lives. The empire will be his.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_51.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_51.text: Gith's wretched son will be the fall of the githyanki.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_6.speaker: Player
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_6.text: Orpheus lives. The empire will be his.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_61.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_61.text: Stand down - I protect the Prism on our queen's behalf!

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_57.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_57.text: This artefact contains the key to our freedom. It is not for the lich queen to take!

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_83.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_83.text: I know exactly what the Prism contains. The traitor prince who would hand us to ghaik.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_77.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_77.text: It seems your report was good, W'wargaz. Glad you could join us, Lae'zel.

GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_75.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShield_OM_Laezel_COM_75.text: I'm told you carry an artefact most cherished.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_14.text: Lae'zel. So you decided to make your appearance.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_41.text: It seems your report was good, W'wargaz.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_55.text: Stand down! It is on our Queen's sacred order that I keep the Prism close.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_0.text: Stand down - I protect the Prism on our queen's behalf!

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_56.text: The Undying Queen cares not for who delivers her the Prism and the traitor prince within.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_35.text: All that matters is that it is delivered.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_69.text: The false heir's head will make a fine trophy for Vlaakith. As for you -

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_15.text: - I will leave nothing behind but meat and shattered bone.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_21.text: The queen has entrusted me with the Prism. Interfere, and death will be her only gift to you.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_29.text: Strike me and die - a failed warrior forgotten by our people.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_34.text: And you, Lae'zel - a child, an unascended - would snatch my glory for herself.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_12.text: Orpheus lives. The empire will be his.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_18.text: This artefact contains the key to our freedom. It is not for the lich queen to take!

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_80.text: I know exactly what the Prism contains. The traitor prince who would hand us to ghaik.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_67.text: Lae'zel. Glad you could join us.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.text: The kith'raki have spread word of that artefact that you carry.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_59.text: An artefact our venerable queen would stop at nothing to take back.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_5.text: Tell me, Lae'zel of K'liir. What reward do you think the Astral Prism will fetch once I pluck it from your corpse and present it to Vlaakith?

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_47.text: What honours, what riches, will the Undying Queen grant me when I hand her the failed prince?

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_1.text: Strike me and die, a failed warrior forgotten by your people.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_23.text: The queen has entrusted me with the Prism. Interfere, and death will be her reward to you.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_17.text: The queen has entrusted me with the Prism. Interfere, and death will be her reward to you.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_68.text: Damnable whelp. For a thousand years have I given my life to Vlaakith.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_3.text: And you - this child, this unascended - would snatch my glory for yourself.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_25.text: You may keep your head. But I will yet be exalted. I will yet see my name carved in slate.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_20.context: NodeContext: Confidently, but not as a battle cry. VLAH-kith-kah SIV-im HRATH KRAHSH-het. Only in Vlaakith may we find light.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_39.text: I will deliver to her the Prince of the Comet. She shall exalt me. The gish will record my great deed in slate!

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_52.text: I'd give the artefact to you freely, but it isn't possible.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_32.text: I will remember you said that.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_70.text: I was not asking for it. Htak'a!

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_64.text: This artefact contains our people's future. I won't let you take it.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_40.text: Dearest Lae'zel. You've fallen victim to a manipulation. The traitor prince would lead us to ruin.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_61.text: Your story ends here. We will reclaim the Astral Prism and restore it to our queen.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_71.text: You cannot best me. You will die here, and your legacy will die with you.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_75.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_75.text: The traitor prince will be the fall of the githyanki.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_4.text: Vlaakith will not have your head today. But have it, she will.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_27.text: Gith's wretched son will be the fall of the githyanki.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Lae'zel
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_37.text: Orpheus lives. The empire will be his.

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.text: It seems your report was good, W'wargaz. Glad you could join us, Lae'zel.
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: addressed to W'wargaz, then Lae'zel

GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Ch'r'ai Har'rak
GithyankiShieldo_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.text: I'm told you carry an artefact most cherished.
